verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In his first Memorial Day remarks as commander - in - chief] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: paid] [ARG1: tribute] [ARG2: to fallen U.S. service members and their families] .
In his first Memorial Day remarks as commander - in - chief , President Donald Trump paid tribute to [V: fallen] [ARG1: U.S. service members] and their families .
